title: Dear Riot, assistance please?
body:
Dear Riot,

It's gotta be said, the "Firewall" error and the leaver buster run an extraordinary tag team.
What's more impressive is that the firewall error is able(?) to occur, even when i have my firewall turned off, that Synergy is outstanding!

Sarcasm aside, there is some serious jank going on. Im'a link a screenshot of my task-manager's processes tab which has *three*, count 'em, **three ** "running" **League of Ledgends.exe** processes. Thats very impressive if i do say so myself.
All because i tried to exit, after the first firewall error failed to achieve anything by pressing reconnect, and restart the client.
Just looking for some help, not even mad about the leaver buster i now have... (okay maybe just a little unhappy)

Yours Sincerely
Zyv.

replies.body:
I have had the same issue occuring once "League of Legends.exe" lanches after champion select. Screenshot attached of today's attempt.

I'm honestly afraid to queue because of experiences like the ones in this thread.

I got my first afk warning the other day because I couldn't connect to a match. I got another one today after daring to share an ARAM with some friends. As far as I'm aware, I had a perfect match completion record before this.

I implore Riot to **put the leaverbuster system on haiatus** until all network/client/server issues have been 100% resolved.

And there's my 5 match priority demotion for trying to troubleshoot the issue further in a bot match with 4 other friends.

**WTB a red post, stat.**

> [{quoted}](name=Zerahl,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ERiPN6n8,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-19T12:07:13.826+0000)

> I implore Riot to **put the leaverbuster system on haiatus** until all network/client/server issues have been 100% resolved.

This. This right here.

I had the same error, with a few connection disconnection errors thrown in. My net was fine btw. I was on a skype call the whole time, which didn't drop or have any connection issues at all, whilst I was trying to reconnect to riot servers. 

I have to say I'm not very keen to play this game anymore, not until A) the firewall error is addressed or B) remove leaver buster and come up with a better solution for intentional afkers/leavers.

It's sad because I do enjoy this game but I can't play it in its current form. :(

> [{quoted}](name=Penthia,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ERiPN6n8,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-03-19T11:32:05.420+0000)

> I have to say I'm not very keen to play this game anymore

Having a 20min wait between getting everyone in the party finally and being able to enter que is absurd. It's essentially ruined the experience. 
The only reason i play is to play alongside my mates. My mates wont play with me cause we have to wait 20min and we all actually have lives and can't commit up to 80min down to a game every time we want to play.

Kill them all or reboot, either way. The firewall issues is actually related to stuff on riots end not much we can do about it. Turning on/off your firewall won't affect any thing related to the error.
The problem was, the processes had frozen. There was no way to remove any of them without a complete restart, and then the firewall error is still there and we get the cycle all over again.

raise a ticket :) 
Fastest way to make them listen.
How do i go about doing that again?

Yeah that happens. It's actually intended, God knows for what reason. That is not your issue here.

Have you tried the usual, such as changing DNS and disabling IPv6?

Update: 20min leaver buster. Thats some hardcore synergy there rito.
TBH thats fucked up.
